checklist.name: Individual protected relaxation areas (IPRAs) on or off premises
Minimisation of jointly used paths to IPRAs (creation of new paths)
Set up external tap (or even shower) with liquid soap
Offer delivery of online shopping to accommodation
Offer hair cutting service at accommodation
Offer disinfectant hand liquid at reception & in rooms/apts
Establish different time slots for each group of guests
• Arriving / leaving the accommodation every day
•  Use of external shower, if any
Fixed supply of latex gloves on arrival
Creation / modification of entrances / external stairs
Carpark with large spaces separated by posts
